title: Solokan
author: Solokan
content: as we know in this world many people who trade in various wayslike someone opening a shop and so on. if I personally have traded, you can call it a shop, and I sell things like rice, eggs, instant noodle snacks and so on.but I want to know what about your experience, have you ever had trading experience?

comments.author: Qaisrani1
comments.body: Yes i had a little bit trading experience .Short term trading goes to loss because there are big whales who did their trading and earn money in short time. So did trading for long term if you have low balance.

comments.author: Fuso.hp
comments.body: Yes I have trading experience now. I am now trading regularly. There was a time when I dreaded trading. And always thought that maybe I would lose everything if I went to trading.  But one day I dared to trade and my first training coin was Bitcoin. Although I made some profit while trading, later on I faced a lot of loss. I have now developed trading experience considering profit and loss. Don't be afraid to trade now.
